pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: The camera starts by showing a dark room with a wooden door and a window with a grid pattern. As the camera moves to the right, more of the room becomes visible, revealing intricate wooden paneling and carvings on the wall. The camera continues to pan right, showing a detailed wooden structure with an arched opening and additional carvings. As the camera moves further, a large, ornate wooden carving with a central emblem and flanking figures comes into view. The final frames show the full details of the carving, which features a central shield with a crest and two figures on either side.
